alert.note: Alert for McLean (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 15 at 8:27PM CDT until April 15 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL LOGAN...SOUTHEASTERN WOODFORD...EASTERN TAZEWELL AND WEST CENTRAL MCLEAN COUNTIES... At 827 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mackinaw, or 12 miles south of Eureka, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Danvers, Goodfield, Carlock and Hudson. This includes the following highways... Interstate 39 between mile markers 0 and 5. Interstate 55 between mile markers 158 and 168. Interstate 74 between mile markers 102 and 133. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
